item.title: Push to Github
item.description: There is some problem when I try to push the project to git hub. I followed the Video ‘Understanding the Jamstack: How to build a blog with Hugo, Netlify CMS and Zapier, by How to Code on Youtube. I created a Github account. Added a repository called “hugo-site”. Then, there is a series of command, which I don’t know the function. I shall probably look at the hugo documentation on Deploying on Github.
